name: ssg-zero
description: One static site generator, zero dependencies.*

scripts.test:coverage: tsc && NODE_DISABLE_COLORS=1 node --enable-source-maps --test --experimental-test-coverage --test-reporter tap | awk '/^# start of coverage/ {p=1} p' | sed '1d;$d;s/|//g;s/^# //g' | awk '!/\.test\.js /' | tee coverage.txt
